Watson-Dev
==========

Work with WSGI applications locally.

For full documentation please see `Read The
Docs <http://watson-dev.readthedocs.org/>`__.

Build Status
^^^^^^^^^^^^

|Build Status| |Coverage Status| |Version|

Installation
------------

``pip install watson-dev``

Dependencies
------------

-  watson-common
